Text:

ettv is the DUCKS GUTS! Thank you for the AVI, very much appreciated. I can't understand why the 'usual' uploaders (one's I've been using for years) have all decided to up & switch formats, it's so GODDAMN FRUSTRATING!! I've been sitting here for 2 freaking days converting files for some of the less popular TV shows, and it really is just a time consuming PAIN IN THE ARSE. (Not to mention that MP4/MKV etc, aren't always a smaller file size than AVI, so really, WTF???) So, once again, THANK YOU! Your ups are always great quality too!

T0 bonnievilleangle, with 55 seeders I can download fairly quickly, so stop your whinning. & to clubber23 , show some intelligence and  spit that nasty shat you call an attempt to communicate out of your filthy mouth please ! & to ettv, you rock bro, thank you, and please keep'em coming , your awesome !
